text: The Crveni Krst concentration camp was a concentration camps in Serbia. Prisoners from different parts of Eastern Europe were taken to this concentration camp. Some sources also say that some German Jews were also in the camp as prisoners. However, as it was not such a big concentration camp, there is not a lot of information about it. Category:History of Serbia Category:Nazi concentration camps Category:The Holocaust
title: Crveni Krst concentration camp
